 Handle by the ARB program object for the ArraySprite. (Default: NULL)
The Tranzperenz(Alpha Color) of the generated shader image (with the ARB program object) can be determined by the grayscale.
Optimal: Post-Processing-Shader Program.
static TexParam::Tex_Param filter
 Set the texture filtering of the Sprite. (Default: Linear).

Detailed Description

Renders a picture(Bitmap), as an array of different values.

Please note the following OpenGL capability are enabled when rendering and at the end disable:
GL_SCISSOR_TEST (if necessary)
GL_STENCIL_TEST
GL_TEXTURE_2D
GL_DEPTH_TEST
GL_ALPHA_TEST
GL_BLEND
and use glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH)

Dont forget to set the depth and alpha test function, e.g.:
glAlphaFunc(GL_GREATER, 0.0f)
glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL)

Used OpenGL Buffers
-GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT
-GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT
-GL_STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT

Member Function Documentation

int F2C::ArraySprite::render ( size_t  starteid,
size_t  endeid 
) const

Renders a particular area (from the starteid to endeid) the elements on the screen.

Parameters:
starteid Start index of the array elements.
endeid End index of the array elements
Returns:
-1, show from viewport is false.
-2, The width or height of the bitmap is 0.
-3, zoom_x or zoom_y is exactly 0
-4, Empty array.
-5, starteid is outside the array elements.
1, Elements has been rendered.
int F2C::ArraySprite::render ( size_t  starteid  )  const

Renders a particular area (from the starteid until the end of the array elements) of the elements on the screen.

Parameters:
starteid Start index of the sprite elements.
Returns:
-1, show is false (or from viewport).
-2, The width or height of the bitmap is 0.
-3, zoom_x or zoom_y is exactly 0
-4, Empty array.
-5, starteid is outside the array elements.
1, Elements has been rendered.
int F2C::ArraySprite::render (  )  const

Renders all elements on the screen.

Returns:
-1, show from viewport is false.
-2, The width or height of the bitmap is 0.
-3, zoom_x or zoom_y is exactly 0.
-4, Empty array.
1, Elements has been successfully rendered.
